website_summaries.verdict: A pricey, battery-powered system that clears sinuses using suction, which may be better at conquering nasal congestion.
pros: Many users rave that its suction mechanism is more effective on their symptoms and doesn't worsen congestion
You can keep your head upright during use, which may be more comfortable
Set comes with nose cleaner, 48 salt pods, countertop caddy, travel case, and one pair of nose pillows
cons: Takes up considerable counter space and requires batteries and proprietary salt pods, which are expensive to replace

customer_reviews.title: The batteries are fine and the motor works fine
customer_reviews.text: My product will mot work. The batteries are fine and the motor works fine. The problem is that no suction occurs and no solution enters my nose.
customer_reviews.author: krypton

customer_reviews.title: In the trash
customer_reviews.text: The whole idea seems impressive but tends to clog with salt. I had used it, mostly once a day, for just over a month when the buzzing indicating the pump was going didn't start. I did a through cleaning of the 3 spots you're supposed to clean after each use to no avail. I called the support line and a nice lady waited while I cleaned it again with her timing. It did come back to life for about a week when the pump quit again. That was enough and into the trash it went.
customer_reviews.author: Chewthrutherestraints

customer_reviews.title: Not that easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I read the instructions thoroughly and watched the Navage videos repeatedly. After going through a dozen saline cartridges I could not get the Navage to perform as advertised. I either got no suction, got saline solution all over the place, or choked on the solution. I also tried reversing the flow and using larger nose pillows without success. I requested and received a full refund from Amazon. I went back to using my Neilmed Sinugator, which I have been using without difficulty for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hall

customer_reviews.title: GIMMICK: won’t operate unless you also buy their single use special k-cups
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it except it requires you to buy their proprietary saline cups to use it. Like, seriously, they think they’re selling a keurig or something. This is a huge turn off. Terrible feature. Wouldn’t have bought if I were aware of that. Other than that, it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: MN_Phil

customer_reviews.title: Feel better!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product l. After a nasty winter with colds and flus I recommend this product to anyone. This winter I was tired of the colds I was getting. I order this and my colds disappeared. But unfortunately May came with the pollen and mold spores came with all the nasty rain we’ve had here in the northeast. Eyes starting itchy also stuffy nose and feel blah. Grabbed out my Navage. With in a hour after use I was feeling relief! What a great product! The only con i find is that after use you feel a little tiny discomfort after use. Goes away after 5-10 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic item!
customer_reviews.text: After my doctor okayed the use once my healing had moved along enough after my surgery to use this instead of the saline rinse bottle, I haven't looked back. This thing is a lifesaver! Makes my life so much easier and helped speed up my healing process. Also, I live on a farm and a lot of my outdoor work leaves a lot to be desired in the allergy department so having this to clean things up is a wonderful relief.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I check the batteries which are good, but for a product that costs so much ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it for occasionally as needed for about 35 times, when it quit functioning.I check the batteries which are good, but for a product that costs so much to only work for basically a month, it's a terrible buy. I liked using it, just can't give a good review to a product that doesn't function.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Fredricksen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time flossing my teeth. I was told about a shower flosser from my dental hygienist. I have used it and it has made a big difference..I also like that this flosser comes with a couple of different attachments to help all your dental needs. I have a deep pocket right beside my back molar and there is a attachment that allows me to flush out any food particle that gets back there along with a gum massager which I used daily. I would highly recommend this product to anyone that dental challenges.
customer_reviews.author: Tazcat

customer_reviews.title: Breathe Better After Just One Use!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. After the very first treatment, I could breather better than I have been able to, in a very long time!! This system is easy to use, fast and works so much better than a Neti Pot or NeilMed!! The design is well thought out, easy to clean and fits together perfectly!! I highly recommend the Navage Nasal Irrigation System, to anyone who suffers from frequent Sinus Infections, as do I, or anyone who simply wants to breathe better.
customer_reviews.author: krz4xms

customer_reviews.title: The machine works
customer_reviews.text: The machine is a great item for people suffering nasal congestion a large part of the time. It's very easy to use with no awkward positions needed for Niti pot use. The deluxe kit has a plastic holder for the parts of the machine which helps to dry the parts after cleaning.I recommended this to a friend of mine suffering more than I do.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Sassaman

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY: Great Device (When it was Working)
customer_reviews.text: Great device that actually works. I just don’t like how they want you to purchase their expensive salt pod. Well with the hack, you can use cheaper salt such as the NeilMed Packets. Search youtube for the Navage Hack video. Device doesn't work anymore. The motor does not turn on. You have to ship your device for warranty and pay for shipping. Save your money, this device doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and works
customer_reviews.text: Now if you have never done this before give yourself time to get use to it. It does get easier and man does it make a difference. The machine is simple to use and does not make a mess. I do recommend you do not wear anything you don't want wet because sometime a little may drip from you nose or mouth until you get use to how to lean over the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie A. Barefoot Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Undecided if its worth price
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I like this yet, very sensitive if you over fill water it will not work, it would not work when i stood ip to use. I made a mess trying to use. Very sensitive if pushing power button becareful the bottom tank will release if you tap it while pushing power button. I guess it works though i saw mucus in bottom tank when finished.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: never mind....turns out it needs batteries every 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is terrific...while it works. Bought mine less than 90 days ago and it stopped working. I called the 800 # and got this fantastic customer service rep, Natalia. She walked me through some desalination yoga exercises for my machine, then suggested that I replace the batteries. I never thought of that, which is why they have Natalia. Thank God.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: NAVAGE...Sinuses BEWARE! The BEST way to whip sinus problems!
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing! With chronic sinusitis, I think I’ve tried every nasal cleaning wash that my ENT doctor had instructed me to. When watching the DR. Oz show in February of 2018, a repressive was on his show demonstrating the ‘Navage’. Well, I just had to go online and check into it. I purchased it right away and haven’t regretted it a bit! It’s fast, works fantastic, gives so much relief from stuffiness and congestion! I plan to tell others about it, that also suffer sinus issues. Navage is the BEST!
customer_reviews.author: GenezCemz

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what it claims to do.
customer_reviews.text: This product takes a little practice to get used to. It does provide suction, which may feel unusual at first. I was expecting better results as far as cleaning out my nose and helping with congestion. I really don't notice any difference and feel the neti pot works just as well and is easier and cheaper to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Dickert

customer_reviews.title: This is great! Amazing how easy it is to use
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Amazing how easy it is to use, and how great you feel after using it! There is a learning curve of about three days. For example, when finished, and removing unit from nostrils, keep head tilted back. Then over sink, tilt head quickly forward to remove remaing water. This prevents water all over your shirt/blouse.
customer_reviews.author: James Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Cool and Clear; A little too complicated & I do not like the idea of having to use a proprietary saline pod at each use... I am planning to drill a small hole in the TOP of the TOP shield and inject my own saline/distilled water solution for USE and for CLEANING.... Will post later the results of this procedure...ad
customer_reviews.author: ad

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good, but make sure your mouth is open ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good, but make sure your mouth is open while operating. If not, you might get water down into your lungs and start coughing. Works good though and makes my sinuses feel so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Works as advertised. Easy to use, clean, and sanitary. I sleep a little better and my allergy reactions happen much less. I find that if I stop mid-cycle and move my head around so that the saline reaches more cracks and crevices, my sinuses feel much more cleaned out. Great product. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Fixed Breathing Issues
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I've broken my nose 11 times and have had two surgeries to repair my deviated septum. I've never felt like I could fully breathe out of my nose until I used this device for 5 days. Three months later and I'm still breathing clearly. It takes a couple times to get used to it, but the results are outstanding, at least for someone who has always had difficulty breathing properly through the nose.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: Item is defective. After a few uses, just ...
customer_reviews.text: Item is defective . After a few uses , just stopped working .
customer_reviews.author: arif kimji

customer_reviews.title: For those with just sinus problems this product will be ...
customer_reviews.text: For those with just sinus problems this product will be worth your purchase. I haven't been able to use any type irrigation system. I suggest you watch a You Tube demonstration of the product. It takes getting used to using, and You Tube will give you pointers.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Works Great...
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful, and works great! Saves who knows how much from having to go to the doctor. At the first sign of sinus illness we all (whole family) use this and our bodies heal... just our experiences.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Helps eliminate Post Nasal Drip
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped me with the tickle I get in my throat from Post Nasal Drip. I am so glad that I got this, especially in light of the Coronavirus, which I didn’t know was going to occur.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Navage Nasal Care-complete kit-Perfect for Adults and Kids
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I am using it as well as 2 of my kids that suffer from allergies really bad. In just a few days, my kids are doing much better-my daughter has seasonal asthma too, this has helped keep her cleared out and no longer coughing all through the night. So glad I purchased. And definitely recommend purchasing the whole kit with extra salt pods (stand, travel case, extra pods....worth it!)
customer_reviews.author: Mechelle

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever!!!! I've had trouble using netipots and other irrigation methods before. This is the first one that WORKED, was easy, and didn't feel like I was getting waterboarded. If you have chronic sinus issues and allergies, this is the best investment you can make. Truly!!!
customer_reviews.author: HEN82

customer_reviews.title: Leaky unit
customer_reviews.text: We like the concept behind the Nasal care my husband would like to continue to use it. Unfortunately after just a few times of using the unit it started to leak. We have now had it just 31 days. It is now very unpleasant to use due to the fact it is more trouble than its worth to clean up the leaky mess afterwards. Would like to try another unit if possible. Even though we are just beyond 30 return policy. Can you help? Kim
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so thanksful for this product! I have had to live with acute sinus symptom since age 10. Two time surgeries, countless antibiotics, used many saline sprays, NeilMed, netti pot, and SinuPlus Elite machine didn’t help! Money wasted didn’t help much that left agitated unease feelings due to residue saline water still left in sockets, forehead, and cheeks. Fortunately, this products was able to push and flush everything out in simple steps and clean my congested sinus swiftly. I’m extremely happy and purchased one more for my son!
customer_reviews.author: KATHY N.

customer_reviews.title: Like being hit in the sinuses with a baseball bat ...
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT use with cold mineral water....oh my lord, i forgot i used a cold bottle of water i got from front desk. Dayum! Like being hit in the sinuses with a baseball bat dressed up with barb wire. However, an asthmatic friend of mine and i (an ex smoker) use it regularly and it is amazing. Just f'ing amazing to use on those worn out nostrils and neurotic sinuses of mine. The salt water packages are a bit of a scam though.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Non Functioning Kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought the model with the travel case and storage stand. The storage stand did not fit the product shipped. The seller should be more though on the complete shipped package. Either a correcting should be made and the right stand shipped or a refund. I am going to send the item back because of this failure.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Weis

customer_reviews.title: was I disgusted at what was up my nose
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it and immediately tried it and wow, was I disgusted at what was up my nose. Used it the second day and got an immediate sinus headache, as I felt the water fill all of my sinus cavities. Won't be an every day thing for me, but instead an once a week or every other week.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Somers

customer_reviews.title: Forget Microwaving Neti pots. Who has time for that!?!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of of putting salt and heating up Neti pots - Sometimes overheating and I have to wait to cool down, or burn my nose using the neti warm. I got tired of buying cheapo neti pots. If you know how to use the Navage correctly - meaning opening/dropping your whole jaw down while breathing, as it works the suction through your nose - you will not have no problem with it! Bad reviewers don't read directions, and they just buy products without understanding severe congestion, honest people have! The best inventions since the Orabrush!
customer_reviews.author: Erick González-Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Great results, don't give up, relief is here.
customer_reviews.text: What a difference it makes cleaning out all stuff that you breathe in all day. Way less allergic reaction to my cats and dog's and greenery. It's a little bit to get use to the water in the nose but don't give up... it will so be worth it...
customer_reviews.author: Gnarly Ed

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly one of the best products I have ever purchased hands down. I have struggled with sinus infections and allergies my whole life and this product has helped significantly. My first one had a slight malfunction but I emailed the company and they responded immediately and shipped me a new one once we attempted troubleshooting over the phone and was determined it needed to be replaced. This company is one of the best when it comes to customer service and products.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia

customer_reviews.title: Sinus issues
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertized, use every day and does the job of keeping sinus passages open. Highly recommend, but be advised you willhave to purchase salt pods on a continuing basis.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: Such a relief
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help me with a severe allergy issue that I was having. It is amazing to see what comes out of your sinus passages. The lightly salted solution provide soothing relief, I couldn’t be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A.

customer_reviews.title: You Won’t Be Sorry!
customer_reviews.text: Navage is the Best Product ever ever owned! I have severe allergies and it helps me so much! When I received this product I had a terrible sinus infection and this machine helped me heal faster. It totally Amazing and worth every penny! Give it a try you won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Kandi Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: It's easier than you think
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest. I thought that using the Navage would be like water-boarding myself. I was wrong! The system is very easy to use. Follow the directions. Flush your nasal passages. Breathe. No drugs needed.
customer_reviews.author: William Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Good cleansing of sinuses.
customer_reviews.text: Good for cleansing sinuses especially if you don't like to use netty pots. Automatic suction is battery powered and there is no need to tilt the head. Don't buy the stand. It's impractical and unstable and doesn't store many salt pods. Carrying case is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this for anyone with nasal problems
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible sinus problems and often times I can't breathe. I felt like I was drowning in mucus and there was nothing that would help. This significantly helped my symptoms and I feel like I can finally talk and swallow without gagging.
customer_reviews.author: Saad Saeed

customer_reviews.title: Poorly built
customer_reviews.text: After several weeks of working effectively, the on/off switch broke, rendering this fairly expensive piece of equipment useless.
customer_reviews.author: Farmington423

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Navage Product
customer_reviews.text: The product has already stopped working. I have only used the product 4 times and it (now) no longer works. Since my return window has passed, I am stuck with a product that no longer functions. I am very disappointed in the obvious quality.
customer_reviews.author: Diane E.

customer_reviews.title: I believe this is helpful to me.
customer_reviews.text: It has gotten easier to use the longer I have it. My sinuses feel more clear after I used this. I use it several times a week. Much better that other methods I have used.
customer_reviews.author: cybercyl

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: Good so far! Does an exceptional job of exactly what it is advertised to do. I would recommend reading the entire owners manual before use, it does work a bit differently from any other rinses I have tried. It is easy to use, and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Zimbeall's Fam

customer_reviews.title: Innovative
customer_reviews.text: Helpful, they can improve the bottom tank design that holds the used solution. It's currently like trying to clean the inside of a tea kettle that has a small opening. I'm sure customers would prefer that the upper surface of that tank was removable for cleaning. I may use this twice a week in winter due to the dry indoor air but not twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: Michail

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about using this, but I kept going through the nasal flush bottles, so I thought I'd try it. This works great. It flushes easily and quickly. I highly suggest it
customer_reviews.author: Ruebourbon

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Took a little getting used to. But I don't know how I lived without it. I do it when I go to bed and I do it again when I get up. I don't have sinus infections I don't have headaches and I don't have to blow my nose at all during the day. It just removes all the mucus and congestion. Completely self-contained. Easy to clean and operate just takes a little getting used to
customer_reviews.author: Richard T

customer_reviews.title: Best product to clean nasal passages...
customer_reviews.text: I was suffering from a sinus infection since the end of October until Christmas week. The Navage irrigation system was suggested to me to help clear my nasal passages. Besides drink lots of fluids, I consistently for 4 days used Navage. Between the two, the built-up mucus was gone and I felt 100% better. I would definitely encourage the use of this product. It is easy to use, clean and store. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee-Z

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how this thing works. Once I tried it I was amazed at how easy it was to use and how comfortable it was to use. And to see all the crap that comes out of your nasal and sinus cavity is gross but I feel so much better knowing it works.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Lawing

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: No matter how adjusted for fit, it still leaked everwhere...back it went.
customer_reviews.author: L Renoir

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a week then stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed the Navage for the week I had it but it no longer works. I’ve changed out batteries and everything and still no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Anetsberger

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month the product stopped working. Changed batteries but it did not help. No sound and no motion. Sent message to seller but no response. Do not purchase!! Update, called customer service and they walked us through some trouble shooting and the unit is working again. We ran hot water through the pump. The salt collected in the pump and stopped it up causing the unit to fail. Great customer service and the product does as it advertises.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: quickly relieved - THANK YOU Navage
customer_reviews.text: wow, Just WOW. I like it alot. 58 yrs old and had my first allergy issue in my life. Rinsed twice and relief. My wife couldn't quite get the hang of it, but i took to it like a duck to water
customer_reviews.author: We BUY it - We REVIEW it

customer_reviews.title: great quality and has help solve chronic allergy sinus problem
customer_reviews.text: Great value, really cleans out sinuses, after using couple times you will wonder how you lived without it. I emptied a antibiotic in to a flush and cleared sinus infection in couple days, amazing
customer_reviews.author: Nite

customer_reviews.title: Works for a lot of people.....but
customer_reviews.text: It simply does work for me. I am one of those people that the salt water ends up going down my throat. I have tried their Trouble Shooting guidelines for this problem, with no improvement. I am sure it works for most people, but for me it was money not well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Skkywlk

customer_reviews.title: More complicated than it needs to be
customer_reviews.text: Once you get the system put together and operating, it works well. However, the manual I received was somewhat different from the device, so there was some guesswork in putting it together. The worst problem was that the manual implied that batteries would need to be installed, and that a special screwdriver was included in the package. But it was not, so we found 15 screwheads, none of which would work. When we did get the compartment opened, the batteries were already installed. I have written the seller about this, but have received no response.
customer_reviews.author: Jaqquan

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 days, wish I could get a replacement
customer_reviews.text: Received this package promptly and really enjoyed it. Unfortunately it broke after 2 days of use. I tried to change the batteries with no luck. The suction stopped and no action happened when I pressed the button. I cleaned everything out and let it dry all day - still no luck with next attempt.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Lindholm

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Works as discribed, a small learning curve now I know what waterboarding is like LOL. Really convenient to use and clean . It does its job keeping the naisel passages moist and clean. Perfect for dry climats.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Definitely give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: You can call me a fan now! I descided to try this system due to all the allergy issues I've been having. Every month, for the last several months, I've been spending $100 on flonase, mucinex, sudafed, etc. I figured if I could go 1 month without purchasing all the allergy stuff then it paid for itself. Almost 2 months in and I just ordered more salt pods and haven't had to buy any of those meds! Definitely worth it to try for yourself
customer_reviews.author: Trishia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great protect and if you have sinuses, trust me, this will fix your problem
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: You should try one, it helps
customer_reviews.text: Love this little machine, I ended up buying a second one for my wife. Easy to use, easy to clean, just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chief, Terry

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from constant nasal congestion due to a perforated septum. This unit works great to clear out the nasal pasaages. While I don't find a lot of what was in the the passages in the container of the Navage, I am able to blow most of it out after using the system. So 4 starts instead of 5, but I would recommend this to anyone who constantly gets stuffed noses.
customer_reviews.author: SoreHeel2012

customer_reviews.title: Good for those with mucus.
customer_reviews.text: Love it worked well and cleared my head. Wish the initial water container was bigger to allow the process to go longer instead of having to refill.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: works really good
customer_reviews.text: My son often gets stuffy nose because of his allergies, this was super easy to use and his sinus was clear after he used it for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: IT DOES THE JOB...
customer_reviews.text: IF WAS VERY EFFECTIVE DURING MY ALLERGY SEASON HERE... DO HAVE TO HAVE A LITTLE CLEARANCE IN NOSE & ALWAYS USE DISTILLED WATER & CLEAN UNIT AFTER... SAVED MY BACON...
customer_reviews.author: LAWRENCE

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Biggest waste of money ever spent! Only works about one in five tries! Wasted several salt pods attempting to retry. When it did work it worked well. Most attempts it did not suction/ rinse. Motor was running but nothing happening.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Foster

customer_reviews.title: No more sinus infections!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I have ever bought on Amazon. I suffer from sinus infections from August through November, but I have not had one yet this year. Its amazing that I finally found something to help me. I use it every day. I feel so much better. THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for cleaning your sinuses!
customer_reviews.text: Works well but takes a while getting use to water flushing out your sinus cavity. You can see the mucus in the water return, gross, but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Michael Davis

customer_reviews.title: This product works well.
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped me with nasal and mucus issues already and I have only used it for two days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nose wash
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the larger nose after I used for a week. Work better for me. Amazed at some stuff that comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this system compared to other nasal irrigations
customer_reviews.text: I really like this system compared to other nasal irrigations. The only negative I experienced was that the angle of the nostril plugs made it difficult to get consistently strong suction. (The nostril covers come in different sizes, but the distance between each cannot be adjusted.)
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I can breathe through my nose again!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had continuous nasal congestion which made it difficult to breathe through my nose. After several times using my navage, I was able to breathe deeply and easily through my nose. I use it once a day and continue to breathe easily and deeply through my nose. The navage far exceeded my expectation. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Pasken

customer_reviews.title: Sinus headache  get gone :)
customer_reviews.text: I love navage just a little expensive but you get what you pay for pods are expensive
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Faisal Akram

customer_reviews.title: A must for allergy sufferers!
customer_reviews.text: This has all but eliminated all of my sinus issues due to allergies. It makes a tremendous difference! I wish I would have gotten one a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: K. Staines

customer_reviews.title: Although it’s not cheap it does the job
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. No leakage as others have mentioned. I keep the nozzles well in! It seems to do the job well and although it feels kinda weird at first you soon get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Stark

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, this really works. It really cleans the mucus from your nose. If you have sinus issues I recommend the Navage
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Durham

customer_reviews.title: should have used along time ago
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, easy to use. You will develop ue own technique in along with instructions by manufacturer. I can breathe better these days
customer_reviews.author: noknee

customer_reviews.title: Great Self Care Product
customer_reviews.text: The navage has plenty of suction and the process goes quickly. I like that it's easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Theresa L. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Best device on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Just had balloon sinus dilation procedure, use Navage twice daily with a spray of fluticasone after. Squeeze bottle rinse doesn't even compare. Best device on the market!
customer_reviews.author: asa1469

customer_reviews.title: Great product, little pricey
customer_reviews.text: Great product, use it everyday. My smell and taste sences are better
customer_reviews.author: Karen Drake

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very effective
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and does exactly what it claims. Immediate relief from congestion, sinus problems, breathing easier.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Kinda bummed out
customer_reviews.text: Im kinda bummbed out ive never successfully gotten this to work as advertised and thats no fun. not sure what to do i kinda wanna return it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: It really helps with my husbands sinuses, great product.
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes this. It has been helping with his sinuses & keeping problems at a minimum. Glad I got it for him & he uses it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: BDeveroux

customer_reviews.title: Suction is a little too strong.
customer_reviews.text: Kinda weird to get used to but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Misael Flores

customer_reviews.title: Relax while doing it and just let it happen.  Bit “unnatural” feeling at first but gets easy after first time or two.
customer_reviews.text: So glad that I got this! A little entertaining to use the first time or two, trying to figure out how to use it but once you learn the trick to it, it’s so easy! I found it really helpful to open mouth and say “ahhhh” while running it. Once you’ve got that position down, you can breathe while doing it and stop saying “ahhh”. LOL. Feels so good to clear the nasal passages! Definitely a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breath easy
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t been able to breath look this in years. Great investment especially if you live in a state like Georgia.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Spears

customer_reviews.title: Be Patient and follow the directions.
customer_reviews.text: Be Patient and follow the directions. Best hundred dollars spent by far. Definitely cleans out your sinuses. Breathing afterwards is just amazing. Make sure to use twice a day when possible during the allergy season. I thank my girlfriend everyday for recommending this little piece of heaven. I can finally breath so much better.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: I'm in Love 😍😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing since sliced bread, seriously, instant easing of my symptoms after it's first use, and it's so simple!!! I lick myself for waiting so long due to the price, but it will pay for itself just in less doctor visits and antibiotics ....
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from nasal congestion quite frequently. This product was recommended by my PCP. I used it for the first time last night and I am hooked. This product is fabulous! It sucked out all the junk that was triggering my allergies and causing the congestion. Woohoo!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: It works wonders my 7 year old loves using this also so I got the smaller nose parts and he does it 2tomes a day all by himself. Great product and works great
customer_reviews.author: pamela hare

customer_reviews.title: No more Headache
customer_reviews.text: I have allergies sinus bad ..I started using this Navage..no more sinus ..the best money in the world I spent ...it takes some time to learn it I mean like two or three times and it’s smooth sailing after that perfect.. when you have a bad sinus headache use your Navage . Headache gone
customer_reviews.author: Tabby Dupree

customer_reviews.title: Easy, quick, efficient
customer_reviews.text: I feel this is so much easier to consistently use. It’s very quick. If you want to use it multiple times you can. I feel it really does the trick the first time around, although since I have had this I haven’t been very congested. So if I am it might be something I do more than once for real congested times. So far love this!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Better than a Netty Pot
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Daughter. She said it's 1000x better than her old Netty pot. She's very happy I bought it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Great relief for allergies etc
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. use warm water always or you'll get brain-freeze. I use it a few time a week
customer_reviews.author: John G Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Greatest thing ever
customer_reviews.text: This has helped my sinus and allergies so much. Learning curve on the use, it helps me to hold my breath with my mouth open while using. So worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Angel L Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Product started leaking just after the return date which was just over one month of use.
customer_reviews.text: Product is time consuming to clean and is not fit for travel. Upper tank started leaking after just one month of use. I found the suction uncomfortable and would not recommend it. I was unable to return the product since the one month had expired by only a few days. Costly to always buy the pods. Unable to use Himalyan Sea Salt.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: use over the sink is an understatement
customer_reviews.text: If your at all sensitive to salt this is a definite no no. Learning curve leaves a bad taste in your mouth makes it hard to continue use. But cost makes you trudge on.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Way better than a netty pot. Got it for the wife who struggles with constant congestion disrupting our sleep. She has done so much better this last month using this as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little to get used to using but does the job. Follow the directions and you'll have no problems. Let the machine do its job and enjoy the results
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

product_meta.title: Navage Nasal Care Deluxe Bundle: Navage Nose Cleaner, 40 SaltPod Capsules, Countertop Caddy, and Travel Case. 148.85 if Purchased Separately. You Save 38.90 (Teal). for Improved Nasal Hygiene.
feature_bullets: Your NOSE is the body’s AIR FILTER. Now you can clean it daily with easy-to-use Naväge!
Naväge uses POWERED SUCTION to FLUSH OUT dangerous germs, allergens, and mucus. You’ll love that clean-nose feeling!
For fast, all-natural relief from allergies and sinus congestion – WITHOUT DRUGS! Naväge operates only with genuine Naväge SaltPod capsules.
Includes the Naväge Nose Cleaner and 40 SaltPod Capsules; Navage Countertop Caddy; and Travel Case. Powered by 2 AA batteries. $148.85 if separate. You save $38.90 (26%)!
Make good NASAL hygiene, YOUR new normal. CLEAN NOSE, HEALTHY LIFE!
